research_notes.finding: Found @shadcn registry with 438+ components available Components include: button, card, dialog, dropdown-menu, tabs, scroll-area, resizable, tooltip, toast, sidebar, context-menu, input, label, separator, sonner, spinner

Add command for priority components: pnpm dlx shadcn@latest add @shadcn/button @shadcn/card @shadcn/dialog @shadcn/dropdown-menu @shadcn/tabs @shadcn/scroll-area @shadcn/resizable @shadcn/tooltip @shadcn/toast @shadcn/sidebar @shadcn/context-menu @shadcn/input @shadcn/label @shadcn/separator @shadcn/sonner @shadcn/spinner

Installation steps: 1. Run: pnpm dlx shadcn@latest init 2. Configure components.json 3. Set up @/components/ui directory structure 4. Install Radix UI dependencies automatically
Vite configuration already includes: - TailwindCSS plugin - Path aliases (@/ → ./src) - React plugin

architecture_patterns.pattern: Components organized by feature: ide/, ui/, layout/ Each component directory has index.ts barrel exports TypeScript interfaces for props (not type aliases) Follow import order convention: React → third-party → internal → relative

Initialize ShadcnUI with dark mode as default Configure theme provider with localStorage persistence Install priority components for IDE: button, card, dialog, dropdown-menu, tabs, scroll-area, resizable, tooltip, toast, sidebar, context-menu, input, label, separator, sonner, spinner Create test component demonstrating all installed components
Dark mode as default (matches UX specification) Light mode toggle functionality CSS variables for theming System theme detection and auto-switching

technical_notes.note: ShadcnUI uses Radix UI primitives under the hood Components are unstyled by default, styled via TailwindCSS Dark mode implementation should use CSS variables for easy theming Ensure WebContainer compatibility (no server-side rendering requirements)

TailwindCSS 4.x is already installed and configured Vite plugin is properly set up in vite.config.ts Path aliases are configured (@/ → ./src) COOP/COEP headers are configured for WebContainer compatibility

ShadcnUI initialization steps: 1. Run init command: pnpm dlx shadcn@latest init 2. Configure components.json with project settings 3. Install priority components using add command 4. Set up theme provider and toggle component 5. Create test component to verify all components work

Component testing requirements: - All components should render correctly with proper styling - Dark/light theme switching should work - No console errors or warnings - Basic functionality should be verified (buttons clickable, dialogs open/close)
